titles.title: A bill to repeal the requirement that taxpayers include on an income return a tax identification number for claimed dependents who have attained the age of 5 years.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 6/29/1988--Introduced. Repeals the provision of the Internal Revenue Code that requires a taxpayer to include a tax identification number for each dependent of age five or older claimed on an income tax return.
